channel.title: Need help with colors
channel.description:
I have a Question/Problem I recolor some items on my rsps like a whip but i dont know how to get new color codes like red for example i know you can also just take color codes from other items in class8.java but i want to create/make new colors
How can i do this?
I know there was a tool for it HWPS? or something like this it was a cmd tool with lots of color codes but uppit deleted it like always... So now i have issues with getting color codes
Does anybody still have this tool? Or can somebody explain me how to get new codes.
Sincerely-Reminance

item.title: Need help with colors
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Most of the time it’s guess and check, at least that’s how I’ve done it in the past.

Read full topic
